misuses.misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
misuses.description: The code selects a default URL using the hardcoded string "http://www.google.com", which is not secure. The vulnerable code is using the default URL without any validation or secure protocol.
misuses.recommendation: Validate the URL and select a secure protocol before using it.

misuses.description: The code hardcodes the default URL as "http://www.google.com" which is not secure. The hardcoded value is vulnerable to tampering.
misuses.recommendation: Remove the hardcoded URL and instead use a secure protocol to validate the user input.
